name: metasploit-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for Metasploit Framework integration. Provides AI assistants with access to 2,565+ exploits, 1,675+ payloads, and complete penetration testing capabilities through natural language.
author: FandresenaR

tools.name: list_exploits
tools.description: Search and list available Metasploit exploit modules

tools.name: list_payloads
tools.description: Search and list available Metasploit payload modules with platform/architecture filtering

tools.name: run_exploit
tools.description: Configure and execute an exploit against a target with vulnerability checking

tools.name: run_auxiliary_module
tools.description: Run Metasploit auxiliary modules (scanners, fuzzers, etc.)

tools.name: run_post_module
tools.description: Execute post-exploitation modules against existing sessions

tools.name: generate_payload
tools.description: Generate executable payload files using Metasploit's payload generator

tools.name: list_active_sessions
tools.description: Display all currently active Metasploit sessions with detailed information

tools.name: send_session_command
tools.description: Execute commands in active Meterpreter or Shell sessions

tools.name: terminate_session
tools.description: Forcefully close and terminate an active session

tools.name: list_listeners
tools.description: Display all active handlers and background jobs

tools.name: start_listener
tools.description: Create and start a new multi/handler to receive connections

tools.name: stop_job
tools.description: Stop a running Metasploit job or handler

tools.name: analyze_exploit_with_ai
tools.description: Use AI to analyze exploits and provide detailed technical insights

tools.name: generate_metasploit_commands_with_ai
tools.description: Generate step-by-step Metasploit commands from natural language

tools.name: analyze_vulnerability_with_ai
tools.description: Analyze vulnerabilities and suggest exploitation approaches

optional.name: MSF_SSL
optional.description: Use SSL for RPC connection (default: true)

optional.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
optional.description: OpenRouter API key for AI-powered analysis features

features: Module Discovery: Search 2,565+ exploits and 1,675+ payloads
Exploitation: Run exploits, auxiliary modules, and post-exploitation
Payload Generation: Create executable payloads in multiple formats
Session Management: Control and interact with active sessions
Handler Management: Manage listeners and background jobs
AI Analysis: OpenRouter-powered exploit and vulnerability analysis
